hotels.title: Nagasaki Harbourside Hideaway near Glover Garden
hotels.description: In the leafy Minamiyamatemachi district, ANA Crowne Plaza Nagasaki Gloverhill, an IHG Hotel, is an urban oasis close to calming gardens and the ocean. Embark on a soothing stroll, visiting western-style heritage mansions and gorgeous greenery in Glover Garden, while Nagasaki Seaside Park boasts serene harbour views and lush lawns, both only a few minutes away. As the sun sets, savour Nagasaki cuisine at Pave restaurant and retire in comfort to a well-appointed room or suite.
